page.title: 20A BIRKDALE HOUSEWIFE
page.content: The Birkdale housewife I interviewed finds that as a mother supplementry benefit is not adequate.The money does not even cover the food that her children require for a week never mind clothes.Since the benefit is so low and her husband is relatively low paid as a teacher she has a part time job as a private job as a teacher.This money is greatly appreciated as an extra income.The housewife has noticed how much differance modern appliances have made like the washing machine,tumble drier and central heating.She says that she is often heard saying,"I don't know how I managed before without it!" refering to the micro-wave oven.Despite these modern appliances much time is still spent doing housework.
